Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transactions.exceptions

Exception Summary
AlreadyAuthorizedException Exception thrown when an user is trying to authorize a payment, but he has already authorized a previous level
AuthorizedPaymentInPastException Exception thrown when a new authorized payment is set to a past date
CannotDenySystemInvoiceException  
CreditsException Common exception for credit issues
InvalidChannelException Exception thrown when a member is invalid for a given operation
InvalidLoanPaymentAmountException Exception thrown when there is an error in teh total amount of the loan payments
MaxAmountPerDayExceededException Exception thrown when the maximum amount per day has been exceeded on a given account
NotEnoughCreditsException Exception thrown when an account does not have enough credits
PartialInterestsAmountException Exception thrown when an user attempts to repay a loan with incomplete interests amount.
PaymentException Base exception for payments
SendingInvoiceWithMultipleTransferTypesWithCustomFields When a member is sending an invoice with custom fields, ther can't have multiple possible payment types, because the custom fields would be inconsistent.
TransferMinimumPaymentException Exception thrown when the maximum amount per day has been exceeded on a given account
UnsortedLoanPaymentsException Exception thrown when the payments of a loan are unsorted
UpperCreditLimitReachedException Exception thrown when a transaction cannot be performed because it would make an account go beyond it's upper credit limit.
